title: IAA Tonight | Patrick Mahomes and Eric Bieniemy Beefing AND Are Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving Cool?
description: Patrick Mahomes and Chiefs offensive coordinator Eric Bieniemy shared a heated moment as the two walked off the field to the team’s locker room on Sunday as Kansas City held a 14–10 halftime lead against the Colts. Former Chiefs RB and IAA host LeSean McCoy has some interesting thoughts about the dispute. Plus, the NBA season is around the corner and Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving have finally spoke after a tumultuous summer. How do the Nets stack up in the Eastern Conference?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (LEger Douzable, LeSean McCoy, Antoine Walker)
